attributes.action: Remove British Forces from Afganistan Forthwith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the hopeless situation in Afganistan and continuing casualties, we believe our forces should leave Afganistan as soon as practically possible and focus on fighting terrorists in specialist operations.We should not be supporting a corrupt  Government in Afganistan and a population that does not want us there.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
